content:
ToastType ToastType Enum

Definition

Namespace:
Assembly:
Microsoft.ServiceBus.dll

Enumerates the types of image and text for toast notification.

Edit

In this Article

[DataContract]
public enum ToastType<DataContract>
Public Enum ToastType
Attributes
DataContractAttribute

Fields

ToastImageAndText01 ToastImageAndText01

Specifies the first type image and text.
ToastImageAndText02 ToastImageAndText02

Specifies the second type image and text.
ToastImageAndText03 ToastImageAndText03

Specifies the third type image and text.
ToastImageAndText04 ToastImageAndText04

Specifies the fourth type image and text.
ToastSmallImageAndText01 ToastSmallImageAndText01

Specifies the first type small image and text.
ToastSmallImageAndText02 ToastSmallImageAndText02

Specifies the second type small image and text.
ToastSmallImageAndText03 ToastSmallImageAndText03

Specifies the third type small image and text.
ToastSmallImageAndText04 ToastSmallImageAndText04

Specifies the fourth type small image and text.
ToastText01 ToastText01

Specifies the first type text.
ToastText02 ToastText02

Specifies the second type text.
ToastText03 ToastText03

Specifies the third type text.
ToastText04 ToastText04

Specifies the fourth type text.
